node.title: 2025-07-26 Radio Arcane
node.displayName: Dead Of Night & The Dark Market feat. Hemlock For Socrates & Carrellee
node.description:
Radio Arcane Presents Dead Of Night & The Dark Market featuring Hemlock For Socrates & Carrellee
The Nightmare continues on Friday, July 25th as Dead Of Night & The Dark Market keep up the monthly grind of dark eclectic music. Come out and help keep the dancefloor barely alive as we celebrate the glum drudgery of our dreadful existence.

This month will feature:

  • Hemlock For Socrates (Pittsburgh)
  • Carrellee (Madison, WI)
  • Radio Arcane Dark Music Specialists - DJs Talamsca, Count Grozny
  • Vending by the talented Dark Market.
  • Food - The Gingerbread Hag
  • Drinks by the enchanting Lany StarDust & Smooth T

18+
$12 Advanced tickets
$16 Day of show

node.title: 2025-08-30 Radio Arcane
node.description:
Radio Arcane Presents Devil’s Night Masquerade Ball

Join The Satanic Temple Kentucky at the amazing Art Sanctuary for a night of elegant and ethereal debauchery. Wear your finest and come dance, be entertained, and live deliciously.

Vending by the talented artists of The Dark Market and more!

DJ Sets by Motuvius Rex and DJ Talamasca

Performances by the Va Va Vixens

Save 10% off a Masquerade mask from Caufield’s with proof of ticket purchase!

18+
$25

node.title: 2025-10-31 Arcane Alive
node.description:
Radio Arcane presents Dark Castle Fest 2025

Details TBA

More info about bands, etc.: https://www.darkcastlefest.com
node.shortDescription: Dark Castle Fest returns for another weekend of celebrating the darkly romantic music and arts of the very unique and beautiful Gothic underground!

node.title: 20 : La Procesión de lo Infinitio
node.description: Twentieth episode of Radio Arcane with hosts Brian Drabant, Motuvius Rex and AndrOspore : Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio. We talk a bit about their history, process and life in their home city of Medellín, Colombia. Recorded from home studios as a production of Art Sanctuary in Louisville, KY.
node.shortDescription: Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio.
